How able is x to decide receive treatment

Source: R/gss_vars_211.R
dectreat.Rd

dectreat

Source

General Social Survey https://gss.norc.org

Details

Question 652. In your opinion, how able is NAME to make his/her own decisions about the treatment s/he should receive – very able, somewhat able, not very able or not able at all?

Overview

For further details see the official GSS documentation.

Values

  • 1 very able

  • 2 somewhat able

  • 3 not very able

  • 4 not able at all

  • NA(d) don't know

  • NA(i) iap

  • NA(j) I don't have a job

  • NA(m) dk, na, iap

  • NA(n) no answer

  • NA(p) not imputable

  • NA(r) refused

  • NA(s) skipped on web

  • NA(u) uncodeable

  • NA(x) not available in this release
